title: Kalpataru Projects International gets tax notice from GST Authority
description: "The authority has demanded to pay an aggregate tax amount of Rs 10.50 lakh and a penalty of Rs 1.50 lakh. The authority has also proposed to levy interest as applicable," the filing said.
